com.pizza.CMModel

Class Grosse

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pizza.CMModel.DBConnect
      • com.pizza.CMModel.Grosse

  • public class Grosse
extends DBConnect

    Controls the database part of the GrosseEintrg Model

    The Grosse class is used to do the actual connection to the database. It contains a set of methods needed to get Grosse entries. Here the actual queries are executed.

      • getList

        public java.util.List<GrosseEintrag> getList()
        This method gets all the entries from the Grosse table
        Returns:
        List This is a list of all the Grosse entries

      • getList

        public java.util.List<GrosseEintrag> getList(java.lang.Integer speiseId)
        This method gets all the entries from the Grosse table that have a specific speiseId. Ex. a speise X that has speiseID id_X can have more than one size i.e. Grosse.
        Parameters:
        speiseId - This is the ID of the speise whose grosse entry we are looking for
        Returns:
        List This is a list of Grosse entries with SpeiseId = speiseId

      • getGrosseFromPreisId

        public GrosseEintrag getGrosseFromPreisId(java.lang.Integer preisId)
        This method gets the specific Grosse entry from the Grosse table that have a certain preisId.
        Parameters:
        preisId - This is the preis ID whose grosse entry we are looking for
        Returns:
        GrosseEintrag This is the Grosse entry corresponding to a certain preisId
